item.title: [Release] Herblaw Quest Updated
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:15, topic:285503”][quote author=brutalmyzery link=topic=377291.msg3089822#msg3089822 date=1262812327]
I replaced my file with that one and it loaded this time, but when i tried to use the meats on the cauldron it didnt work. just said nothing interesting happens… I have everything just like you guys said and it dont work.

also wondering, i put in a tab for quests, and how would i make it so when you complete this quest the name of it in the quest list turns green?
[/quote]

If the quest has been completed, make it send a packet to show it’s finished.

[/quote]
or use 1 packet to send all quests at login, and 1 packet when quest status has been changed,
also ,why u would use a stat for questpoints?
use this instead

public int questPoints;

and for quest status i recommend to use array.

private int[][] questStatus = new int[30][30];

and you should add some delays on npc’s speech.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Herblaw Quest Updated
item.dc:creator: @brutalmyzery brutalmyzery
item.description:
@brutalmyzery wrote:

I’m having some trouble getting this working…
could anyone tell me exactly where to put this in the InvUseOnObject file?
I tried to put it at the bottom, and when i compile the window closes really fast and it doesnt work
so i tried changing it but still get errors/the compiler closes really fast.

not the whole page, just a little above where i put the code in (at the bottom)

[code] owner.teleport(owner.getX(), 484, false);
}
break;
case 60: // Melzars maze
if(!itemId(new int[]{421})) {
owner.getActionSender().sendMessage(“Nothing interesting happens.”);
return;
}
owner.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You unlock the door and go through it”);
doDoor();
if(owner.getX() <= 337) {
owner.teleport(338, owner.getY(), false);
}
break;
default:
owner.getActionSender().sendMessage(“Nothing interesting happens.”);
return;
}
owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
}

		private boolean itemId(int[] ids) {
			return DataConversions.inArray(ids, item.getID());
		                 
                      }
                           		      	}

	      				
	      				
			case 236: // Cauldron of Thunder
	      				if(item.getID() == 502) {
							owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the bear meat into the strange looking liquid.");
							owner.setBusy(true);
	      					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
	      						public void action() {
								world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
	      								public void action() {
	      									if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) {
											owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The bear meat has now been enchanted.");
					      						owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(505));
					      						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
					      					}
					      					owner.setBusy(false);
	      								}
	      							});
	      						}
	      					});
	      					break;
	      				}
						if(item.getID() == 503) {
							owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the rat meat into the strange looking liquid.");
							owner.setBusy(true);
	      					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
	      						public void action() {
								world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
	      								public void action() {
	      									if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) {
											owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The rat meat has now been enchanted.");
					      						owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(506));
					      						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
					      					}
					      					owner.setBusy(false);
	      								}
	      							});
	      						}
	      					});
	      					break;
	      				}
						if(item.getID() == 504) {
							owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the beef into the strange looking liquid.");
							owner.setBusy(true);
	      					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
	      						public void action() {
								world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
	      								public void action() {
	      									if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) {
											owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The beef has now been enchanted.");
					      						owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(507));
					      						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
					      					}
					      					owner.setBusy(false);
	      								}
	      							});
	      						}
	      					});
	      					break;
	      				}
						if(item.getID() == 133) {
							owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the chicken meat into the strange looking liquid.");
							owner.setBusy(true);
	      					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
	      						public void action() {
								world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
	      								public void action() {
	      									if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) {
											owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The chicken meat has now been enchanted.");
					      						owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(508));
					      						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
					      					}
					      					owner.setBusy(false);
	      								}
	      							});
	      						}
	      					});
	      					break;
	      			  }	
                                   }
	});
  		return true;
}

}
[/code]

I dont think thats right lol im kinda new at this but im learning fast[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2010, 01:36:06 am[/size][hr]yeah so its the code theres something wrong with it or im not putting it in the right spot because when i put it in, no matter where i put it when i try to compile i get massive erros and the compiler closes in like .2 seconds…

item.title: [Release] Herblaw Quest Updated
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

thought i’d help those who are having trouble:

case 236: // Cauldron of Thunder if(item.getID() == 502) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the bear meat into the strange looking liquid."); owner.setBusy(true); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The bear meat has now been enchanted."); owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(505)); owner.getActionSender().sendInventory(); } owner.setBusy(false); } }); } }); break; } if(item.getID() == 503) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the rat meat into the strange looking liquid."); owner.setBusy(true); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The rat meat has now been enchanted."); owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(506)); owner.getActionSender().sendInventory(); } owner.setBusy(false); } }); } }); break; } if(item.getID() == 504) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the beef into the strange looking liquid."); owner.setBusy(true); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The beef has now been enchanted."); owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(507)); owner.getActionSender().sendInventory(); } owner.setBusy(false); } }); } }); break; } if(item.getID() == 133) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the chicken meat into the strange looking liquid."); owner.setBusy(true); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The chicken meat has now been enchanted."); owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(508)); owner.getActionSender().sendInventory(); } owner.setBusy(false); } }); } }); break; }

if(player.getMaxStat(15) > 2) {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@You have already completed this quest!");
npc.unblock();
}
else if(player.getMaxStat(15) < 2) {

item.title: [Release] Herblaw Quest Updated
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:5, topic:285503”][quote author=Motaro link=topic=377291.msg2842769#msg2842769 date=1246069221]
With your quest stat thing, you’ll only be able to like have one quest on your server.
[/quote]

Why so?

owner.setQuestPoints(owner.getQuestPoints() +AMOUNT);

@KO9, thanks ^^[/quote]

Well, since you can’t do the quest if you have more than two quest points, if you do any other quest on that server, and gain 2 or more quest points, then you wouldn’t be able to do this herblaw one.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Herblaw Quest Updated
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

Not really sure what you’re trying to do in your first block of code tbh but if I understand it this is a better way of doing it:

case 236: // Cauldron of Thunder if(item.getID() == ID || item.getID() == ID || item.getID() == ID || item.getID() == ID) { switch(item.getID()) { case bleh: ID2 = whatever; case bleh2: ID2 = whatever; case bleh3: ID2 = whatever; case bleh4: } owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the meat into the strange looking liquid."); owner.setBusy(true); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The meat has now been enchanted."); owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(ID2)); owner.getActionSender().sendInventory(); } owner.setBusy(false); } }); } }); break; }

item.title: [Release] Herblaw Quest Updated
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Someone PM’d me and asked me to make it so that you need to enchant the meat in the couldron.

Add this to your InvUseOnObject.java file

						case 236: // Cauldron of Thunder
		      				if(item.getID() != ID) {
								owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the meat into the strange looking liquid.");
								owner.setBusy(true);
		      					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
		      						public void action() {
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
		      								public void action() {
		      									if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) {
												owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The meat has now been enchanted.");
						      						owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(ID));
						      						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						      					}
						      					owner.setBusy(false);
		      								}
		      							});
		      						}
		      					});
		      					break;
		      				}
							if(item.getID() != ID) {
								owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the meat into the strange looking liquid.");
								owner.setBusy(true);
		      					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
		      						public void action() {
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
		      								public void action() {
		      									if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) {
												owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The meat has now been enchanted.");
						      						owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(ID));
						      						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						      					}
						      					owner.setBusy(false);
		      								}
		      							});
		      						}
		      					});
		      					break;
		      				}
							if(item.getID() != ID) {
								owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the meat into the strange looking liquid.");
								owner.setBusy(true);
		      					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
		      						public void action() {
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
		      								public void action() {
		      									if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) {
												owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The meat has now been enchanted.");
						      						owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(ID));
						      						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						      					}
						      					owner.setBusy(false);
		      								}
		      							});
		      						}
		      					});
		      					break;
		      				}
							if(item.getID() != ID) {
								owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You dip the meat into the strange looking liquid.");
								owner.setBusy(true);
		      					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
		      						public void action() {
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
		      								public void action() {
		      									if(owner.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) {
												owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The meat has now been enchanted.");
						      						owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(ID));
						      						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						      					}
						      					owner.setBusy(false);
		      								}
		      							});
		      						}
		      					});
		      					break;
		      				}

All you need to do is fill in the IDs.

The enchanted meat IDs are: 505, 506, 507 and 508.

Also, replace your Kaqemeex.java file with this:

package org.rscdaemon.server.npchandler;

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Npc;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.World;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.ChatMessage;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.MenuHandler;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.ShortEvent;
import org.rscdaemon.server.util.Formulae;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.*;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.*;

public class Kaqemeex implements NpcHandler {
	/**
	 * World instance
	 */
	public static final World world = World.getWorld();

	public void handleNpc(final Npc npc, Player player) throws Exception {
			if(player.getMaxStat(15) > 2) {
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@You have already completed this quest!");
			npc.unblock();
			}
			else if(player.getMaxStat(15) < 2) {
      		player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "If you bring me the following items, I will reward you greatly.", player));
      		player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "I need the meat from four different animals.", player));
      		player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "You will also be required to enchant the meat.", player));
      		player.setBusy(true);
      		world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) {
      			public void action() {
      				owner.setBusy(false);
				String[] options = new String[]{"Ok, I will help you.", "No, thank you."};
				owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(options) {
					public void handleReply(final int option, final String reply) {
						if(owner.isBusy()) {
							return;
						}
						owner.informOfChatMessage(new ChatMessage(owner, reply, npc));
						owner.setBusy(true);
						world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
							public void action() {
								switch(option) {
									case 0: //Yes
										world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
											public void action() {
													if(owner.getInventory().countId(505) < 1) {
													}
													if(owner.getInventory().countId(506) < 1) {	
													}
													if(owner.getInventory().countId(507) < 1) {
													}
													if(owner.getInventory().countId(508) < 1) {
													owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You do not have all the required items.");
													running = false;
													owner.setBusy(false);
													npc.unblock();
												}
											else {
												owner.getInventory().remove(505, 1);
												owner.getInventory().remove(506, 1);
												owner.getInventory().remove(507, 1);
												owner.getInventory().remove(508, 1);
												owner.setExp(15, 250);
												owner.setCurStat(15, 3);
												owner.setMaxStat(15, 3);
												owner.setQuestPoints(owner.getQuestPoints() +2);
												owner.getActionSender().sendStat(15);
												owner.getActionSender().sendQuestPoints();
												owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
												owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@Congratulations! You have just completed the: @whi@Druidic Ritual @gre@quest!");
												owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@You now have access to the Herblaw skill!");
												owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@You just advanced 2 " + Formulae.statArray[15] + " levels!");
												owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@You gained 2 Quest Points!");
												npc.unblock();
												owner.setBusy(false);
											}}
										});
										return;
									case 1: //No
										owner.setBusy(false);
										owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Ok. Come back when you change your mind.", owner));
										npc.unblock();
										return;
									default:
										owner.setBusy(false);
										npc.unblock();
										return;
								}
								
							}
						});
					}
				});
				owner.getActionSender().sendMenu(options);
			}
		});
		npc.blockedBy(player);
	}
	
}

}

Read full topic
